explanation: Todd claims he spent Saturday afternoon driving to his parents' house in Riverside. But Clue 2 shows he badged into the office at 2:30 PM Saturday and didn't leave until 5:45 PM — he was at the office for over three hours on Saturday afternoon, not driving to Riverside. Clue 3 confirms Riverside is a four-hour drive, making his Saturday arrival impossible. Todd was in the office with ample time and access to fill the CEO's office with balloons. Clue 1 shows the balloons were bought that same Saturday morning.
funFact: The largest office prank on record involved 28,000 sticky notes covering every surface of a coworker's cubicle — it took four people an entire weekend.
